column2: eating there is more difficult than giving a spoken word beat poetry performance to a room full of weak bladdered
column3: deaf elders.  Oh my god!  If seating takes the navigational skills of a Navy Seal Commander
column4: don't you think it is time to do something about it?  Expand
column6: offer take out only?  It was absolutely insane and this was at 2:30 on a Sunday! I can't even imagine what a lunch hour or a Saturday during dinner would be like.  Yikes.
